title: Crater Lake three-day weekend is a perfect end of summer trip (photos)
text: BING NEWS: Crater Lake three-day weekend is a perfect end of summer trip (photos) About three weeks from now students will return to school, and summer will have come to an abrupt end. Yes, that soon. There is still time for one last getaway, and Crater Lake might be the perfect three-day weekend to close summer.
